attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ASBOs clearly aren't working as a method of discouraging anti-social behaviour. Many of those exhibiting such behaviour see being given an ASBO as a rite of passage.

Punishment for repeat offences of this nature should be forced conscription into "boot camps", where the offender will learn proper behaviour and hopefully be encouraged to act more accordingly. Further offences after this should result in hard prison time.
